class Solution {
public:
    bool checkStraightLine(vector<vector<int>>& coordinates) {
        int x1,y1,x2,y2;
        x1=coordinates[0][0];
        y1=coordinates[0][1];
        x2=coordinates[1][0];
        y2=coordinates[1][1];
        if(coordinates.size()==2){
            return true;
        }
        for(int i=2;i<coordinates.size();i++){
            int x3=coordinates[i][0];
            int y3=coordinates[i][1];
            if((y2-y1)*(x3-x1)!=(x2-x1)*(y3-y1)){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int ans=0;
    void dfs(int index,vector<int>& nums,unordered_map<int,int>& freq,int k){
        if(index==nums.size()){
            ans++;
            return;
        }
        dfs(index+1,nums,freq,k);
        if(freq[nums[index]-k]==0 && freq[nums[index]+k]==0){
            freq[nums[index]]++;
            dfs(index+1,nums,freq,k);
            freq[nums[index]]--;
        }
    }
    int beautifulSubsets(vector<int>& nums, int k) {
        unordered_map<int,int> freq;
        dfs(0,nums,freq,k);
        return ans-1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> maximumBeauty(vector<vector<int>>& items, vector<int>& queries) {
        vector<int> answer(queries.size(),0);
        for(int j=0;j<queries.size();j++){
            int target=queries[j];
            int maxnum=0;
            for(int i=0;i<items.size();i++){
                if(items[i][0]<=target){
                    maxnum=max(maxnum,items[i][1]);
                }
            }
            answer[j]=maxnum;
        }
        return answer;
    }
};

æ–¹æ³•äºŒ

è€è€å®å®ç”¨äºŒåˆ†ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å‰ææ˜¯æœ‰åºã€‚

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> maximumBeauty(vector<vector<int>>& items, vector<int>& queries) {
        sort(items.begin(),items.end());
        vector<int>maxbeauty(items.size());
        maxbeauty[0]=items[0][1];
        for(int i=1;i<items.size();i++){
            maxbeauty[i]=max(maxbeauty[i-1],items[i][1]);
        }
        vector<int>answer(queries.size(),0);
        for(int j=0;j<queries.size();j++){
            int target=queries[j];
            int left=0;
            int right=items.size()-1;
            int index=-1;
            while(left<=right){
                int mid=left+(right-left)/2;
                if(items[mid][0]<=target){
                    index=mid;
                    left=mid+1;
                }
                else{
                    right=mid-1;
                }
            }
            if(index!=-1){
                answer[j]=maxbeauty[index];
            }
        }
        return answer;
    }
};

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ bills ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ bills[i] æ˜¯ç¬¬ i ä½é¡¾å®¢ä»˜çš„è´¦ã€‚å¦‚æœä½ èƒ½ç»™æ¯ä½é¡¾å®¢æ­£ç¡®æ‰¾é›¶ï¼Œè¿”å› true ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å› false ã€‚

  • 1 <= bills.length <= 105

**æ‰¾é›¶æ—¶ï¼Œå°½é‡å…ˆç”¨å¤§é¢ã€‚**å¹¶ä¸”åªè®°å½•5ç¾å…ƒã€10ç¾å…ƒçš„æ•°é‡ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºè¿™é¢˜ç›®çš„æƒ…å†µä¸å¯èƒ½æ‰¾20å—ï¼‰é‚£ä¹ˆ

  • æ”¶åˆ°5ç¾å…ƒ ç›´æ¥æ”¶
  • æ”¶åˆ°10ç¾å…ƒ 10-5=5 æ‰¾5ç¾å…ƒï¼ˆå¦‚æœæœ‰ï¼‰
  • æ”¶åˆ°20ç¾å…ƒ è´ªå¿ƒæ¥äº†~20-5=15ä¼˜å…ˆä½¿ç”¨10+5æ‰¾é›¶ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç”¨5+5+5ï¼ˆå¦‚æœæœ‰ï¼‰

å®Œæ•´ä»£ç 

class Solution {
public:
    bool lemonadeChange(vector<int>& bills) {
        int five=0,ten=0;
        for(int bill:bills){
            if(bill==5){
                five++;
            }
            else if(bill==10){
                if(five!=0){
                    five--;
                    ten++;
                }
                else{
                    return false;
                }
            }
            else if(bill==20){
                if(ten>0 && five>0){
                    ten--;
                    five--;
                }
                else if(five>=3){
                    five-=3;
                }
                else{
                    return false;
                }
                
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    void swap(vector<int>& nums,int i,int j){
        int t;
        t=nums[i];
        nums[i]=nums[j];
        nums[j]=t;
        
    }
    void moveZeroes(vector<int>& nums) {
        int i=0; 
        for(int j=0;j<nums.size();j++){
            if(nums[j]!=0){
                swap(nums,i,j);
                i++;
            }
        }

    }

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> plusOne(vector<int>& digits) {
        int len=digits.size();
        if(digits[len-1]!=9){
            digits[len-1]+=1;
        }
        else{
            int cnt=0;//è®°å½•9å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé9å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡å³ä¸ºlen-cnt-1
            for(int i=len-1;i>=0;i--){
                if(digits[i]==9){
                    cnt++;
                }
                else{
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(cnt==len){
                digits.insert(digits.begin(),1);
                for(int i=1;i<len+1;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
            else{
                int index=len-cnt-1;
                digits[index]+=1;
                for(int i=index+1;i<len;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
        }
        return digits;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {
        bool increase=true,decrease=true;
        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
            if(nums[i+1] > nums[i]){
                decrease=false;
            }
            if(nums[i+1] < nums[i]){
                increase=false;
            }
        }
        return decrease || increase;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    unordered_map<char,int>mymap={
        {'I',1},
        {'V',5},
        {'X',10},
        {'L',50},
        {'C',100},
        {'D',500},
        {'M',1000},
    };
    int romanToInt(string s) {
        int ans=0;
        int len=s.length();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            if(mymap[s[i]]<mymap[s[i+1]]){
                ans-=mymap[s[i]];
            }
            else{
                ans+=mymap[s[i]];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) {
        int len=s.length();
        int m=0,n=0;
        for(int i=len-1;i>0;i--){
            if(s[i]!=' ' && (s[i+1]==' ' || s[i+1]=='\0')){
                m=i;
            }
            if((s[i-1]==' ' || s[i-1]=='\0') && s[i]!=' '){
                n=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        return m-n+1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) {
        int len=s.length();
        int ans=0;
        int i=len-1;
        while(i>=0 && s[i]==' '){
            i--;
        }
        while(i>=0 && s[i]!=' '){
            ans++;
            i--;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isPalindrome(int x) {
        if(x<0 || (x%10==0 && x!=0)){
            return false;
        }
        int num=0;
        while(x>num){
            num=num*10+x%10;
            x/=10;
        }
        return x==num || x==num/10;
    }
};

        int cnt=strs.size();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            char c=strs[0][i];
            for(int j=1;j<cnt;j++){
                if(i==strs[j].size() || strs[j][i]!=c){
                    return strs[0].substr(0,i);
                }
            }
        }
        return strs[0];
    }
};

æœ¬é—®é¢˜ä¸­ä¸éœ€è¦æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¹¶ä¸éœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ° unordered_mapã€‚

class Solution {
public:
    int calPoints(vector<string>& operations) {
        vector<int>ans;
        for(string ch:operations){
            if(ch=="+"){
                ans.push_back(ans[ans.size()-1]+ans[ans.size()-2]);
            }
            else if(ch=="D"){
                ans.push_back(ans.back()*2);
            }
            else if(ch=="C"){
                ans.pop_back();
            }
            else{
                ans.push_back(stoi(ch));
            }
        }
        return accumulate(ans.begin(),ans.end(),0);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int removeDuplicates(vector<int>& nums) {
        int ans=1;
        for(int i=1;i<nums.size();i++){
            if(nums[i]!=nums[i-1]){
                nums[ans]=nums[i];
                ans++;

        return ans;
    }
};

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ’åºæ•°ç»„å’Œä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œåœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å…¶ç´¢å¼•ã€‚å¦‚æœç›®æ ‡å€¼ä¸å­˜åœ¨äºæ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼Œè¿”å›å®ƒå°†ä¼šè¢«æŒ‰é¡ºåºæ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        while(nums.size()!=1){
            if(target<nums[0]){
                return 0;
            }
            for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
                if(nums[i]==target){
                    return i;
                }
                else if(nums[i]<target && nums[i+1]>=target){
                    return i+1;
                }
            }
            return nums.size();
        }
        return (target<=nums[0])? 0:1;
    }
};

ç„¶åæäº¤ä¹‹åæ„è¯†åˆ°ä¸ç¬¦åˆé¢˜æ„ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å†æ¥æ¢ä¸ªæ€è·¯ï¼šäºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾
æˆ‘å‰å‡ å¤©åˆšè®°çš„äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬”è®° ä»Šå¤©ç«Ÿç„¶æ²¡æ„è¯†åˆ°è¿™é“é¢˜æœ‰å¤šç›´ç™½åœ°æ˜ç¤ºæˆ‘è¦ç”¨!!!âˆ‘(ï¾ŸĞ”ï¾Ÿãƒ)ãƒ

  • ç›®æ ‡ target

è®¡ç®— mid ä½ç½®ï¼š
å¦‚æœ nums[mid] == targetï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›ç´¢å¼•ã€‚
å¦‚æœ nums[mid] < targetï¼Œè¯´æ˜ target åº”è¯¥åœ¨å³åŠéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥leftå‘å³ç§»åŠ¨ï¼ˆleft = mid + 1ï¼‰ã€‚
å¦‚æœ nums[mid] > targetï¼Œè¯´æ˜ target åº”è¯¥åœ¨å·¦åŠéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥rightå‘å·¦ç§»åŠ¨ï¼ˆ right = mid - 1ï¼‰ã€‚

å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸåï¼Œleft å°±æ˜¯ target åº”è¯¥æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚

äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾æœ€åŸºç¡€çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int left,right;
        left=0;
        right=nums.size()-1;
        while(left<=right){
            int mid=left+(right-left)/2;
            if(nums[mid]==target){
                return mid;
            }
            else if(nums[mid]<target){
                left=mid+1;
            }
            else{
                right=mid-1;
            }
        }
        return left;
    }
};
